name: Connect Chat
description:
There’s a place where you can be anyone you want.
A place that transcends space and time, and lets you communicate any way you want.
...and it’s all a headset away.
Inhabit your favorite avatar and experience Connect Chat.
Welcome to the ever-expanding world of social VR.

Features:
-Voice chat with avatars in public and private rooms.
-Full body avatars.
-Use of custom avatars with DMM VR Connect service.
-Hand gestures via VR HMD and controllers.
-Facial expression control and lip sync for avatars.
-3D Spatial Audio: The closer you are to someone, the better you can hear them.
-Worlds: Chat with people in simple, easy to navigate rooms.

*The early access version of Connect Chat has the basic functions required for communicating in VR.
